repairedDockerfile:
FROM alpine:3.6 
RUN apk -v --update add \  
python \  
py-pip \  
groff \  
less \  
mailcap \
&& \
 pip install --no-cache-dir --upgrade awscli==1.14.5 s3cmd==2.0.1 python-magic && \
apk -v --purge del py-pip && \
rm /var/cache/apk/*
VOLUME /root/.aws 
VOLUME /project 
WORKDIR /project 
ENTRYPOINT ["aws"]
